sections.heading: Nonrecurring adoption expense program; funding; use of other resources; payment8-162
sections.text: Nonrecurring adoption expense program; funding; use of other resources; paymentA. The department shall establish and administer a program of payment for nonrecurring adoption expenses. Nonrecurring adoption expenses
